page.title: 11Village Festival,Prickwillow
page.content: The Festival was held on the 22/23rd of June.{Derek Andrews (Prickwillow {Pottery)}was the co-ordinator. There were traditional Village events such as a Pigeon Shoot, Farm Rides, Bowls, Church Fete, Vintage cars, Exhibition and Flower Festival. Each event supported a particular Charity such as Oxfam, Village Hall Fund, Steeple restoration fund, Prickwillow drainage Engine Trust. The Exhibition{Portrait of a Village consisted of entries by local painters photographers, writers and crafts people on the subject of Prickwillow and its people. Sales of work went to Charity. More than 2,000 people came to this weekend Festival. Derek felt that small Villages needed attention drawn to the quality of life in them, despite depopulation and loss of services.
